data.title: Otaku No Anime ~ Library
data.meta_description: Browse through our vast library of anime and manga.
data.text:
Rules

For each rental, a member is granted one grace week after the due date of their rental in which the late charge will not apply.

Once said rental is late (past both the due date and grace week), the charge will be $1 a day for the first week with an additional charge of $2 per day for the second week and an additional $3 per day the third week and so on until the rental has been returned or total price of the rental has been charged.

A rental may be renewed so that it is due one week from the renewal date. If the rental has been renewed, a grace week will not apply to said renewal week.

If another member has requested an item that is being rented, that item may not be renewed by the person who is renting it.
